## vetiver_endpoint { #vetiver_endpoint }

`vetiver_endpoint(url: str = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/predict')`

Wrap url where VetiverModel will be deployed

### Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description          | Default                           |
|--------|--------|----------------------|-----------------------------------|
| `url`  | str    | URI path to endpoint | `'http://127.0.0.1:8000/predict'` |

### Returns

| Type   | Description          |
|--------|----------------------|
| str    | URI path to endpoint |

### Examples

```python
>>> import vetiver
>>> endpoint = vetiver.vetiver_endpoint(url='http://127.0.0.1:8000/predict')
```
